properties.name: Fawcett's Rectangle
properties.description: Rectangular earthwork approximately 200m x 200m with raised central platform and ceremonial path. Pottery fragments found within perimeter.

properties.name: Roosevelt Complex
properties.description: Complex of connected geometric shapes covering approximately 1 sq km. Predominantly circles and rectangles with a large central circular structure (diam. 100m) and radiating rectangular structures.

properties.name: Petersen Trapezoid
properties.description: Trapezoidal earth platform (80m at widest) with linear ridges extending in cardinal directions. Connected to circular depression (50m diam.) to the north.

properties.name: Kamarakoto Circle
properties.description: Circular earthwork with four entrances, reportedly containing multiple structures and a central 'sacred area'. Connected to other sites by straight paths.
properties.source: Oral History, recorded by Eduardo Neves, 2013

properties.name: Tuiuca Meeting Ground
properties.description: Geometric earthworks visible during dry season. Reportedly a trading and celebration site for multiple groups, with structures built on raised earth.
properties.source: Oral History, recorded by Eduardo Neves, 2013

properties.name: Arac√° Geoglyphs
properties.description: Complex of interconnected geometric ditches and berms forming precise shapes. Only visible via LiDAR or during extreme drought conditions.

properties.name: Javari Raised Fields
properties.description: Extensive pre-Columbian agricultural system with raised fields, canals, and habitation mounds. Covers approximately 5 sq km.

properties.name: Negro-Branco Junction Site
properties.description: Settlement complex with both residential and ceremonial areas. Features include earthen berms, middens, and evidence of long-term occupation.

properties.name: Terra Preta Site Alpha
properties.description: Extensive area of anthropogenic dark earth (terra preta) indicating long-term settlement. Rich in pottery fragments and organic material.

properties.name: Circular Village Pattern Beta
properties.description: Circular pattern of vegetation anomalies suggesting a ring village layout. Diameter approximately 120m with central plaza area.
